pageTitle: [AGI-NEUT] Swip Hillscraper, the Goblin Skyspurer - DotA Forums
textBeforeTable: Swip Hillscraper - the Goblin Skyspurer HERO Updated guide Reworked scaling on Gas Leak Reworked stat gain Changed primary attribute to STR April 11, 2012 Reworked scaling on Postcombustion Reworked stat gain Changed primary attribute to INT December 19, 2011 Did some little tweaks on Spur (thanks to irisu for the idea) Added some little notes to Post-Combustion and Spur July 22, 2011 Removed MS boost on Carpet Bombing Fixed english July 20, 2011 Posted topic July 19, 2011 Created hero July 18, 2011
textAfterTable: 44-46 Armor: 5.4 Movespeed: 290 Attack Range: 450 Attack Animation: 0.30 / 0.45 Casting Animation: 0.50 / 0.35 Post-combustion Type: Toggle On/Off Targeting: Self Hotkey: C Swip unleashes the full potential of his machine by letting his engines go full power in successive MS boosts. Dramatically increase movement speed and allows flying over impassable terrain, but drains HP and reduces turning rate by 50%.   Cooldown Effects 1
